A '''chiseled quartz block''' is a [[Block variant|variant]] of the [[block of quartz]] that can be crafted from [[quartz slab]]s.

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Chiseled quartz blocks can be [[breaking|mined]] using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, it [[drops]] nothing.
